title: Devourer Stacks share dont work with Rift Herald
body: When im the Jungler and do the Rift Herald with a Teammate i dont get 5 stacks for my devourer item, not even 2? Im not sure if this should be like this but when I get the last hit on the Herald I receive 5 stacks so i think its a bug that the stacks dont share if i leave the Herald buff for the Laning Teammate PLS FIX THIS RIOT {{item:1415}} {{item:1411}} {{item:1403}}

replies.body:
German forum, german language.
